content:
I cannot provide you with definitive information about the long-term effects of using memory bread frequently as it is a fictional gadget. however, in the doraemon series, there is no reference to suggest that memory bread has any harmful long-term effects or that it could cause someone's brain to become dependent on it.

on the contrary, memory bread is portrayed as a temporary aid that can help individuals to remember things that they may have forgotten. it is not intended to replace the brain's natural learning and recall functions, but rather to stimulate and enhance them temporarily. in fact, its effects are short-lived, and memories will fade away if not reinforced.

overall, based on the context of the doraemon series, there is no indication that using memory bread frequently could cause any long-term effects or dependence on the gadget for memory recall. however, it's worth noting that the series utilizes science fiction and fantasy elements, and in reality, there is no such gadget as memory bread available.
